items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft, Warm, and Cozy
items.body: Absolutely in love with my Softies Ultra-Soft Solid Marshmallow Lounge Set! The fabric is incredibly soft and stretchy. It’s the perfect weight—not too heavy, but it keeps me warm at night. I live in Florida, so we keep our house freezing day and night. I appreciate how versatile it is; I can wear it for a night in or while working from home. I can even pair the top with some jeans or leggings for a quick run to the store for more snacks. The top is slightly oversized with longer arm length, and I love that. I am 5'4 and the leg length is perfect. Read more
items.author: Keri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious!
items.body: Worth every penny! Material feels luxurious and entire garment is comfortable and feels like a hug! Read more
items.author: Mike

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softies
items.body: Great buy! Very nice and so soft . Read more
items.author: Silly Kelly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cozy
items.body: These are truly super soft, comfortable and cozy!! Even so, I feel like they are over priced ( over $100 seems like a lot, especially considering the packaging, which was just in a thin plastic bag). The arms and legs run a bit on the short side as well. They are very giftable, however. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
items.body: Wayyyy too long. Extremely expensive but nice and soft. I didn’t like the flared leg at the bottom its a trip hazard Read more
items.author: suzie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and perfect fit
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wash and dry separately
items.body: Don't wash and dry with other clothes, it sheds. Otherwise it is beautifully comfortable, pretty, cozy and soft Read more
items.author: Irina USA

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cherry Cola, Almond, Fig, Coco, Espresso, Black, Driftwood, Midnight, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
